str2: A prolonged form of nun for emphasis; just now.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) gen: I obtain, (b) absol: I chance, happen; ordinary, everyday, it may chance, perhaps.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Dative Neuter Singular
str2: How much, how great, how many, as great as, as much. By reduplication from hos; as As.
Differing, different; hence: excellent. From diaphero; varying; also surpassing.
From leitourgeo; public function ('liturgy') or almsgiver).
From diatithemai; properly, a disposition, i.e. a contract.
From mesos; a go-between, i.e. an internunciator, or a reconciler.
Stronger, more excellent. Comparative of a derivative of kratos; stronger, i.e. better, i.e. Nobler.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Feminine Singular
Verb - Perfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From nomothetes; to legislate, i.e. to have enactments injoined, be sanctioned.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
Stronger, more excellent. Comparative of a derivative of kratos; stronger, i.e. better, i.e. Nobler.
A promise. From epaggello; an announcement.
